sentences.en: a representative democracy
sentences.cn: 代议制民主政体

sentences.en: a union representative
sentences.cn: 工会代表

sentences.en: Acting as the media representative , the TV news anchors are brands themselves.
sentences.cn: 作为媒介的代言人, 节目主持人本身就是品牌.

sentences.en: an elected representative of the people
sentences.cn: 民选代表

sentences.en: He is a representative for a large steel company.
sentences.cn: 他是一家大型钢铁公司的代理人.

sentences.en: He is representative of a big firm.
sentences.cn: 他是某大公司的代理人.

sentences.en: He was in no way representative of dog-trainers in general.
sentences.cn: 他远不是一般意义上的驯狗师。

sentences.en: She is altogether too representative of the gut feeling in the constituencies.
sentences.cn: 她彻底体现了选民们的真实感情.

sentences.en: Shijiazhuang is a representative city for the study of groundwater salt pollution.
sentences.cn: 石家庄市地下水盐污染研究具有典型示范性.

sentences.en: Sometimes nature does it in a face -- it makes the face representative of all desire.
sentences.cn: 有时候造物主用人的面孔来表现 -- 用面孔来表现所有的欲望.

sentences.en: The company hired the President's special trade representative to lobby Mr. Pierce.
sentences.cn: 公司雇用了总统的特别商业顾问去游说皮尔斯先生.

sentences.en: The latest incident is representative of a wider trend.
sentences.cn: 最近发生的事件代表了一个更大的趋势。

sentences.en: The legal profession is starting to be less elitist and more representative.
sentences.cn: 法律行业正开始变得更具平民性，不像从前那么精英化。

sentences.en: The pollsters asked a representative sample of New York residents for their opinions.
sentences.cn: 民意调查员向一些有代表性的纽约居民征询了意见。

sentences.en: The present representative of the Dedlocks is an excellent master.
sentences.cn: 德洛克家目前的继承人是个非常好的主人.

sentences.en: The tiger is a common representative of the cat family.
sentences.cn: 虎是一种普通的猫科动物.

sentences.en: This case is representative of the attitudes of the police.
sentences.cn: 这个事例典型地反映了警方的态度.

sentences.en: This question is very representative.
sentences.cn: 这问题非常典型.

sentences.en: This warning is that it is representative to use the most simplicity language.
sentences.cn: 这警告是用最简明的语言表示的.

sentences.en: We hope that a representative will soon be appointed to come here for the discussion on the compensation.
sentences.cn: 望速派人前来商谈有关赔偿事宜.

words.tran_cn: 能被代表的；能上演的；能被描绘的
代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

phrases.tran_cn: 客户服务代表，顾客服务代理人
市场代表，销售代表；营销代表

trans.tran_cn: 典型的，有代表性的，代议制的，相当[类似]（另一种属）的
trans.tran_en: typical of a particular group or thing

trans.tran_cn: 代表，继任者，议员，类似物
trans.tran_en: someone who has been chosen to speak, vote, or make decisions for someone else
